sentences.sentence: Culturing programs and record keeping can uncover the root of mastitis problems.
sentences.translation: 养殖计划和保持记录可以发现乳腺炎问题的根源。

sentences.sentence: When mastitis problems are detected, knowing the pathogens can make a big difference in treatment success.
sentences.translation: 发现乳腺炎问题时，了解病原体对于成功治疗有很大的不同。

sentences.sentence: Monitor mastitis events, bulk tank bacteria counts and spikes in somatic cell counts to identify noncompliance.
sentences.translation: 监测乳腺炎的发生，奶罐中的细菌数量和体细胞计数峰值，以发现异常情况。
